long_description: From world travel to mountain treks, the rugged ExOfficio Roughian(TM) Shorts are up to the task with their durable cotton/polyester/spandex fabric blend. Rugged cotton/polyester canvas blend is designed to withstand the rough and tumble world of adventure travel; a bit of spandex adds comfortable stretch. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Hand pockets and rear pockets; zippered security pockets in 1 back pocket and the right hand pocket. ExOfficio Roughian Cargo shorts have a natural fit that's shaped close to the body. Closeout.
short_description: From world travel to mountain treks, the rugged ExOfficio Roughian(TM) Shorts are up to the task with their durable cotton/polyester/spandex fabric blend.
